GV05prasup_u:0_0: sukeśā ca bhāradvājaḥ śaibyaś ca satyakāmaḥ sauryāyaṇī ca gārgyaḥ kausalyaś cāśvalāyano
GV05prasup_u:0_1: bhārgavo vaidarbhiḥ kabandhī kātyāyanas te haite brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhā paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā
GV05prasup_u:0_2: eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādam upasannāḥ || PrUp_1.1 ||
GV05prasup_u:2: bhūya eva tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsyatha |
GV05prasup_u:4: yadi vijñāsyāmaḥ sarvaṃ ha vo vakṣyāma iti || PrUp_1.2 ||
GV05prasup_u:6: bhagavan kuto ha vā imāḥ prajāḥ prajāyanta iti || PrUp_1.3 ||
GV05prasup_u:10: sa tapas taptvā sa mithunam utpādayate rayiṃ ca prāṇaṃ ceti |
GV05prasup_u:11: etau me bahudhāḥ prajāḥ kariṣyata iti || PrUp_1.4 ||
GV05prasup_u:12: ādityo ha vai prāṇo rayir eva candramāḥ |
GV05prasup_u:13: rayir vā etat sarvaṃ yanmūrtaṃ cāmūrtaṃ ca |
GV05prasup_u:15: athāditya udayan yatprācīṃ diśaṃ praviśati tena prācyān prāṇān raśmiṣu saṃnidhatte |
GV05prasup_u:16: yad dakṣiṇaṃ yat pratīcīṃ yad udīcīṃ yad adho yad ūrdhvaṃ yad antarā diśo yat sarvaṃ prakāśayati tena sarvān prāṇān raśmiṣu saṃnidhatte || PrUp_1.6 ||
GV05prasup_u:19: viśvarūpaṃ hariṇaṃ jātavedasaṃ parāyaṇaṃ jyotir ekaṃ tapantam /
GV05prasup_u:20: sahasraraśmiḥ śatadhā vartamānaḥ prāṇaḥ prajānām udayaty eṣa sūryaḥ // PrUp_1.8 //
GV05prasup_u:23: tad ye ha vai tadiṣṭāpūrte kṛtim ity upāsate te cāndramasam eva lokam abhijayante |
GV05prasup_u:25: tasmād eta ṛṣayaḥ prajākāmā dakṣiṇaṃ pratipadyante |
GV05prasup_u:26: eṣa ha vai rayir yaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ || PrUp_1.9 ||
GV05prasup_u:27: athottareṇa tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā vidyayātmānam anviṣyādityam abhijayante |
GV05prasup_u:28: etad vai prāṇānām āyatanam etad amṛtam ayam etat parāyaṇam |
GV05prasup_u:32: pañcapādaṃ pitaraṃ dvādaśakṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam /
GV05prasup_u:33: atheme anya u pare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḍara āhurarpitamiti // PrUp_1.11 //
GV05prasup_u:35: tasya kṛṣṇapakṣa eva rayiḥ śuklaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05prasup_u:36: tasmād eta ṛṣayaḥ śukla iṣṭaṃ kurvantītara itarasmin || PrUp_1.12 ||
GV05prasup_u:39: prāṇaṃ vā ete praskandanti ye divā ratyā saṃyujyante |
GV05prasup_u:41: annaṃ vai prajāpatis tato ha vai tadretaḥ |
GV05prasup_u:42: tasmād imāḥ prajāḥ prajāyanta iti || PrUp_1.14 ||
GV05prasup_u:43: tad ye ha vai tatprajāpativrataṃ caranti |
GV05prasup_u:48: teṣām asau virajo brahmaloko na yeṣu jihvam anṛtaṃ na māyā ceti || PrUp_1.16 ||
GV05prasup_u:52: kaḥ punar eṣāṃ variṣṭha iti || PrUp_2.1 ||
GV05prasup_u:54: ākāśo ha vā eṣa devo vāyur agnir āpaḥ pṛthivī vāṅmanaścakṣu śrotraṃ ca |
GV05prasup_u:56: vayam etad bāṇam avaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmaḥ || PrUp_2.2 ||
GV05prasup_u:58: mā mohamāpadyatha, aham evaitat pañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitad bāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmīti |
GV05prasup_u:62: tasmiṃś ca pratiṣṭhamāne sarva eva prātiṣṭhante |
GV05prasup_u:63: tad yathā makṣikā madhukararājānam utkrāmantaṃ sarvā evotkrāmante |
GV05prasup_u:64: tasmiṃś ca pratiṣṭhamāne sarvā eva prātiṣṭhante |
GV05prasup_u:67: eṣo 'gnis tapaty eṣa sūrya eṣa parjanyo maghavān eṣa vāyuḥ /
GV05prasup_u:68: eṣa pṛthivī rayir devaḥ sadasac cāmṛtaṃ ca yat // PrUp_2.5 //
GV05prasup_u:69: arā iva rathanābhau prāṇe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05prasup_u:70: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni yajñaḥ kṣatraṃ brahma ca // PrUp_2.6//
GV05prasup_u:71: prajāpatiś carasi garbhe tvam eva pratijāyase |
GV05prasup_u:72: tubhyaṃ prāṇa prajās tv imā baliṃ haranti yaḥ prāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhasi || PrUp_2.7 ||
GV05prasup_u:73: devānām asi vahnitamaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prathamā svadhā /
GV05prasup_u:74: ṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ satyam atharvāṅgirasām asi // PrUp_2.8 //
GV05prasup_u:75: indras tvaṃ prāṇa tejasā rudro 'si saṃharañ jagat |
GV05prasup_u:76: sthitau ca pari samantādrakṣitā pālayitā parirakṣitā |
GV05prasup_u:78: tvam antarikṣe 'jasraṃ carasi udayāstamayābhyāṃ sūryas tvam eva ca sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ patiḥ || PrUp_2.9 ||
GV05prasup_u:79: yadā tvam abhivarṣasy athemāḥ prāṇa te prajāḥ /
GV05prasup_u:82: vayam ādyasya dātāraḥ pitā tvaṃ mātariśva naḥ // PrUp_2.11//
GV05prasup_u:83: yā te tanūrvāci pratiṣṭhitā yā śrotraṃ yā ca cakṣuṣi /
GV05prasup_u:84: yā ca manasi saṃtatā śivāṃ tāṃ kuru motkramīḥ // PrUp_2.12 //
GV05prasup_u:85: prāṇasyedaṃ vaśe sarvaṃ tridive yat pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05prasup_u:86: māteva putrān rakṣasva śrīś ca prajñāṃ ca vidhehi na iti // PrUp_2.13 //
GV05prasup_u:103: evam evaiṣa prāṇa itarān prāṇān pṛthak pṛthag eva saṃnidhatte || PrUp_3.4 ||
GV05prasup_u:107: eṣa hy etad dhutam annaṃ samaṃ nayati |
GV05prasup_u:114: athaikayordhva udānaḥ puṇyena puṇyaṃ lokaṃ nayati |
GV05prasup_u:117: ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇa udayati |
GV05prasup_u:118: eṣa hy enaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prāṇam anugṛhṇānaḥ |
GV05prasup_u:119: pṛthivyāṃ yā devatā saiṣā puruṣasyāpānam avaṣṭabhya |
GV05prasup_u:126: prāṇas tejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathā saṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati || PrUp_3.10 ||
GV05prasup_u:130: utpattim āyātiṃ sthānaṃ vibhutvaṃ caiva pañcadhā |
GV05prasup_u:131: adhyātmaṃ caiva prāṇasya vijñāyāmṛtam aśnute vijñāyāmṛtam aśnuta iti || PrUp_3.12 ||
GV05prasup_u:137: kasmin nu sarve saṃpratiṣṭhitā bhavantīti || PrUp_4.1 ||
GV05prasup_u:139: yathā gārgya marīcayo'rkasyās taṃ gacchataḥ sarvā etasmiṃs tejomaṇḍala ekībhavanti |
GV05prasup_u:141: evaṃ ha vai tat sarvaṃ pare deve manasy ekībhavati |
GV05prasup_u:142: tena tarhy eṣa puruṣo na śṛṇoti |
GV05prasup_u:158: yad ucchvāsaniḥśvāsāvetāvāhutī samaṃ nayatīti sa samānaḥ |
GV05prasup_u:161: sa enaṃ yajamānam aharaharbrahma gamayati || PrUp_4.4 ||
GV05prasup_u:165: deśadigantaraiś ca pratyanubhūtaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pratyanubhavati |
GV05prasup_u:166: dṛṣṭaṃ cādṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāśrutaṃ cānubhūtaṃ cānanubhūtaṃ ca saccāsacca sarvaṃ paśyati |
GV05prasup_u:170: atha tadaitasmiñ śarīra etat sukhaṃ bhavati || PrUp_4.6 ||
GV05prasup_u:171: sa yathā somya vayāṃsi vāsovṛkṣaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhante |
GV05prasup_u:172: evaṃ ha vai tat sarvaṃ para ātmani saṃpratiṣṭhate || PrUp_4.7 ||
GV05prasup_u:194: eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ |
GV05prasup_u:197: sa yo ha vai tadacchāyam aśarīram alohitaṃ śubhram akṣaraṃ vedayate yas tu somya |
GV05prasup_u:200: vijñānātmā saha devaiś ca sarvaiḥ prāṇā bhūtāni saṃpratiṣṭhanti yatra /
GV05prasup_u:201: tad akṣaraṃ vedayate yas tu somya sa sarvajñaḥ sarvam evāviveśeti // PrUp_4.11 //
GV05prasup_u:203: sa yo ha vai tad bhagavan manuṣyeṣu prāyaṇāntam oṃkāram abhidhyāyīta |
GV05prasup_u:204: katamaṃ vāva sa tena lokaṃ jayatīti || PrUp_5.1 ||
GV05prasup_u:206: etad vai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yad oṃkāraḥ |
GV05prasup_u:209: sa tenaiva saṃveditas tūrṇam eva jagatyām abhisampadyate |
GV05prasup_u:211: sa tatra tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā sampanno mahimānam anubhavati || PrUp_5.3 ||
GV05prasup_u:214: sa somaloke vibhūtim anubhūya punar āvartate || PrUp_5.4 ||
GV05prasup_u:215: yaḥ punar etaṃ trimātreṇomity etenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta |
GV05prasup_u:218: evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmuktaḥ sa sāmabhir unnīyate brahmalokam |
GV05prasup_u:219: sa etasmāj jīvadhanāt parāparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣam īkṣate tad etau ślokau bhavataḥ || PrUp_5.5 ||
GV05prasup_u:220: tisro mātrā mṛtyumatyaḥ prayuktā anyonyasaktā anaviprayuktāḥ /
GV05prasup_u:221: kriyāsu bāhyābhyantaramadhyamāsu samyakprayuktāsu na kampate jñaḥ // PrUp_5.6 //
GV05prasup_u:222: ṛgbhir etaṃ yajurbhir antarikṣaṃ sāmabhir yat tat kavayo vedayante /
GV05prasup_u:223: tam oṃkāreṇaivāyatanenānveti vidvān yat tac chāntam ajaram amṛtam abhayaṃ paraṃ ceti // PrUp_5.7 //
GV05prasup_u:225: bhagavan hiraṇyanābhaḥ kausalyo rājaputro māmupetyaitaṃ praśnamapṛcchata |
GV05prasup_u:227: tam ahaṃ kumāram abruvaṃ nāham imaṃ veda |
GV05prasup_u:228: yady aham imam avediṣaṃ kathaṃ te nāvakṣyam iti |
GV05prasup_u:229: samūlo vā eṣa pariśuṣyati yo 'nṛtam abhivadati |
GV05prasup_u:232: taṃ tvā pṛcchāmi kāsau puruṣa iti || PrUp_6.1 ||
GV05prasup_u:234: ihaivāntaḥ śarīre somya sa puruṣo yasminn etāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ prabhavantīti || PrUp_6.2 ||
GV05prasup_u:236: kasminn aham utkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasmin vā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti || PrUp_6.3 ||
GV05prasup_u:238: prāṇāc chadvāṃ khaṃ vāyur jyotir āpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam annād vīryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ karma lokā lokeṣu nāma ca || PrUp_6.4 ||
GV05prasup_u:239: sa yathemā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrāyaṇāḥ samudraṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti |
GV05prasup_u:242: evam evāsya paridraṣṭur imāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti |
GV05prasup_u:245: sa eṣo 'kalo 'mṛto bhavati tadeṣa ślokaḥ || PrUp_6.5 ||
GV05prasup_u:246: arā iva rathanābhau kalā yasmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GV05prasup_u:247: taṃ vedyaṃ puruṣaṃ veda yathā mā vo mṛtyuḥ parivyathā iti // PrUp_6.6 //
GV05prasup_u:249: etāvad evāham etat paraṃ brahma veda |
GV05prasup_u:251: te tam arcayantas tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo 'smākam avidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ tārayasīti namaḥ |
